quotes: 7.7/10: too much Yamcha!

quotes.text: A dinosaur can't teach Yamcha how to ride a ball
A lion can eat Yamcha and still be hungry

quotes: A man once said: 'If you ain't first, you're Yamcha!'

quotes.text: A wild $fleeingpokemon appeared! Yamcha fled!
Abra used Teleport! Yamcha fainted!
Actually, Yamcha knows Instant Transmission. He can send his life to nowhere in an instant

quotes: All men are created equal... except Yamcha, he sucks!
An old lady helped Yamcha cross the street
Any person who finishes last still gets ahead of Yamcha
By singing, Yamcha can be shattered by glass

quotes.text: Dark Souls was originally named Yamcha's Life... but he couldn't get past the title screen

quotes: Due to censorship, it's common to replace terms related to death with 'being Yamcha-d'

quotes.text: Even Krillin thinks Yamcha stinks

quotes: Fighters train with punching bags the same way punching bags train with Yamcha

quotes.text: George Lucas followed Yamcha's advice. Then the prequels were made

quotes: God doesn't believe in Yamcha
For some reason, there's a locker named Yamcha. It never locks.
If Yamcha collects all dragon balls, he can make 0 wishes
If Yamcha gets robbed, he has to go to jail
If you commit a foul against Yamcha, your team can score a penalty
In fighting games, 'training mode' is commonly known as 'Yamcha'

quotes.text: In My Hero Academia, Yamcha's quirk is 'None for You'
In Ultra Instinct, Yamcha can defeat TWO Saibamen
Jobbers usually perform their finishing move on Yamcha. Six times

quotes: Lightning never strikes twice... unless it's Yamcha

quotes.text: Look, I can see Yamcha's parachute! He's not ok.
Mr. Satan rejected a fusion with Yamcha, because anyone who fuses with Yamcha becomes weaker

quotes: Murphy's Law was originally planned to be Yamcha's Law, but Yamcha lost a vote by a count of zero
Negative numbers go from 0 to Yamcha
Neither Cell nor Buu would ever risk absorbing Yamcha. They'd become weaker
On the streets, it's common for dogs to step on Yamcha
On a clown's birthday, Yamcha is usually hired to be made fun of
Pokémon is confused! Yamcha hurt himself in its confusion!
Rabbits can pull Yamcha out of their hats
Someone shared a picture of Yamcha on $socialnetwork. Yamcha's account was deleted
There was a time when Yamcha tried to capture a Pokémon. He caught himself
Tomorrow never dies... unless it's Yamcha!
Toriyama drew Yamcha with just toilet paper and his bottom... while taking a dump
Toriyama forgot about Lunch because he thought it was Yamcha
Trash has to take out Yamcha once a week

quotes.text: VOLTORB used SELFDESTRUCT! Only YAMCHA fainted!

quotes: When a ghost dies, it becomes Yamcha
When kids misbehave in school, they have to sit in a corner and look at Yamcha

When Yamcha goes for a swim, he gets burned
When Yamcha prays to god, it's always the devil that answers
Whenever Yamcha buys Kinder Surprise, it comes with no toy

quotes.text: Whenever Yamcha trains on the Hyperbolic Time Chamber for a long time, he comes out weaker

quotes: While you read this quote, Yamcha died... right after the first 'w'

Yamcha bought WinRAR

quotes.text: Yamcha can die from "just a flesh wound"

quotes: Yamcha can lose a game by playing rock against scissors

quotes.text: Yamcha can only use iPhones: Androids can kill him easily

quotes: Yamcha can own a mansion and remain homeless

quotes: Yamcha can win the lottery and still owe money for the ticket

Yamcha got fired for being unemployed

quotes.text: If Yamcha were a Pokémon, he'd be weak against all types... including Normal

quotes: Yamcha likes pineapple on a pizza

quotes: Yamcha stopped walking at the age of 1... month

quotes: You can't tell Yamcha to 'have a blast'. He'd take it too literally
